name: The Last Wave (Imanster)
description:
The last wave of the worldwide pandemic, left mankind in a very bad state. Fortunately, humans have discovered a treatment, that will completely cure any patient suffering from the disease. Your hospital is one of the few places that offers this treatment. It is your job to make sure that this wave of the pandemic, would be the last wave.

This game was made for the 214th Weekly Game Jam.
